about_the_game:
Want to enjoy some duck techno without having to click on ducks? Here's the soundtrack of Juliäntli in MP3 and Wav format.

Tracklist

  • 01 Juliäntli Soundtrack
  • 02 Juliäntli Soundtrack Instrumental

If you like Juliäntli's music, please consider buying this OST. This will support the composer who created the amazing soundtrack, and who would like to do more crazy duck songs!

Manual

The soundtrack will appear in the game's root installation directory. You will be able to access it via:

Steam Library -> Juliäntli -> Properties -> Local Files -> Browse Local Files... -> Juliantli Soundtrack

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Must be able to play .mp3 or .wav files
